product_overview: JobMatch AI is a comprehensive intelligent job application assistant designed to streamline the job seeking process by integrating LinkedIn profile import, AI-powered resume generation, job matching with compatibility scoring, tailored application material creation, and detailed application tracking alongside subscription management.
core_goals: Automate and personalize job application materials using AI to save time.
Provide accurate AI-powered job matching with skill gap analysis to improve application relevance.
Offer an integrated application tracking system with status management and smart follow-up reminders.
Enable seamless LinkedIn profile integration and resume management.
Support tiered subscription plans with usage limits and premium feature unlocking.
key_features: LinkedIn OAuth integration and profile import wizard for easy start.
AI-driven resume optimization and multi-format resume export.
Automated job scraping with a centralized database and compatibility scoring.
Custom AI-generated tailored resumes and cover letters per job application.
Comprehensive application tracker with status lifecycle, notes, and timelines.
Tiered subscription and billing system with usage enforcement for Basic and Premium plans.
User account management including security (2FA), notification preferences, and privacy controls.
user_flow_summary: User imports LinkedIn profile via step-by-step wizard and manages/edit resume with AI suggestions.
Browse and filter jobs with real-time match scores and detailed compatibility breakdowns.
Generate tailored application materials with AI and submit applications tracked automatically.
Manage and update application statuses, schedule follow-ups, and analyze job search effectiveness.
Handle subscription upgrades/downgrades triggered by usage limits and payment processing with confirmation feedback.
validation_criteria: Successful LinkedIn OAuth authentication and accurate profile import.
AI-generated resume and cover letter relevance with multiple variants available.
Job matching scores correlate with user feedback and skill gap accuracy.
Application tracker reflects real-time status updates and follows lifecycle flow.
Subscription usage limits enforced correctly with upgrade prompts and billing handled securely.
User account settings are editable, secure, and reflect privacy/compliance requirements.
UI responsiveness and accessibility confirmed across supported devices and browsers.
